A note on indefinite pronouns in English
Yosuke Sato
December 2009
 

This squib presents new evidence for Kishimoto's (2000) N-raising analysis of the English postnominal modification exhibited by indefinite pronouns such as everything as in everything interesting vs. *interesting everything, and for the possibility of N-raising in English, more generally. The evidence comes from what I dub the "every-X there is" construction.
